Title: Fumikiri Jikan
Description: ["Every day, all kinds of different people stop at railroad crossings on their way to work or school, resulting in all sorts of different conversations. Friends, enemies, acquaintances, and complete strangersâ€”there's always a new encounter to be had.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Fumikiri Jikan, ' documents the discussions that take place at these locations.
